results.title: Resource Geologist
results.description: We are looking for Namibian Resource Geologists to place in a mine in Namibia. You must be in possession of B.Degree or relevant national diploma in Geology along with at least 7 years' experience in the Geology field with a focus on resources/production. In your application, please make sure to tell us what commodities you have experience in. The ideal candidate will have some project experience as well.

results.title: Junior Quantity Surveyor
results.description: Junior Quantity Surveyor's with Office management experience are urgently needed in Durban. Suitable candidates must hold a B.Sc Hons Quantity surveying degree coupled with at least 1-3 years experience in the PQS/Consulting sector.

A Project Management firm in Johannesburg is searching for a Professionally Registered Civil Engineer with roads experience to join their dynamic team. Ideal candidates will have a B.Sc, B.Eng degree in civil engineering, 8-10 years' relevant road experience, as well as professional registration with ECSA.
results.title: Civil Engineer Roads
Project Manager
results.description: Property Developer is seeking a Project Manager to join their Cape Town team.The ideal candidate will have a BSc degree in Construction/Commerce as well as a post-graduate Property Management or Project Management degree. Candidate's must possess at least 7 years experience in maintaining real estate and project managing the construction of new developments.

A well-established Consulting firm is currently looking for a Junior Bridge Engineer to be based in Sunninghill, Gauteng.Suitable candidates will have a BSc/ BEng in Civil Engineering or a BTech in Civil/ Structural Engineering. This position requires the candidate to have a minimum of 3 years post graduate experience. This candidate must also have experience with Finite Element Design Software (PROKON, STRAP etc.). Registration with ECSA as a Candidate Engineer/ Technologist is requires.

results.description: An exciting opportunity exists in the Northern Cape for an Ore Processing Manager. To be considered you need to be in possession of a B.Tech in Metallurgy, have 8- 10years experience working in a mining process plant. Experience in base metal experience is an added advantage.

results.title: Coal Plant Manager
results.description: One of the largest coal mining companies with operations all over Africa is urgently looking to employ a Coal Plant Manager to run the operations at their coal plant in Mpumalanga. Candidates must be in possession of a Degree / Diploma in Metallurgy and a relevant management / marketing certificate / diploma. Candidates are required to have at least 8 years operational experience on a coal plant with coal marketing experience being very important.
